info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 5:23PM EDT until May 13 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of western Maryland, including the following county, Allegany.
* WHEN...Until 1115 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 520 PM EDT, Emergency management reported widespread flash flooding in Westernport, Luke, and Barton. Between 2.5 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. The water level on Georges Creek at Westernport has surpassed major flood stage of 12 feet and appears to be cresting. At this level, numerous buildings and roads in the town of Westernport and points upstream are flooded; water reaches both railroad bridges upstream of Westernport, as well as multiple bridges in Westernport. Additional rainfall may exacerbate the flooding that is already occurring. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Westernport... Lonaconing... Piedmont... Barton... Franklin... Luke... Dogwood Flats... Reynolds... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
